name: Fateful
effect: The weapon this mod is applied to gains Reliable 2. If it already had Reliable 2 or higher, add 1 to its Reliable damage.

name: High-Frequency Weapon Insulation
effect: When you make an attack with the weapon this mod is applied to, you may activate this system, unloading it and taking 2 Heat. If you do, your attack deals +1d6 explosive bonus damage on a hit. This system is treated as a weapon for the purposes of effects that load or unload weapons.
